fields.name: Id
fields.description: The ID of the storage account resource. Media Services relies on tables and queues as well as blobs, so the primary storage account must be a Standard Storage account (either Microsoft.ClassicStorage or Microsoft.Storage). Blob only storage accounts can be added as secondary storage accounts.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The current status of the storage account mapping.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the storage account.
